raw_body:
APA RAJAPAKSA WIJAYA SIRISENA – It is with deep sorrow that we announce the passing of Mr Wijaya Sirisena Rajapaksa Yapa,​ Son of late Mr and Mrs S R Yapa,​ father of Leisha Yapa Mutaliph,​ son-in-law of Ifthi Mutaliph,​ brother of Dayangani Perera,​ Dr. Manel Tuovinan,​ Indira Aluwihare,​ Agrasena Yapa,​ brother-in-law of Roy Perera,​ Professor Oli Tuovinen. Meril Aluvihare,​ and late Mrs Ramani Yapa. Uncle of Dr Esther Perera,​ Clive Burnette,​ Priyanga,​ Karoliina and Katariina Tuovinan,​ Kavan,​ Roshani,​ Niranjan Aluwihare,​ Dr Sharini Yapa and Jack Taylor
030616
